newsitem.title: CANADA: DBRS upgrades Cominco Ltd to BBB.
newsitem.headline: DBRS upgrades Cominco Ltd to BBB.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service said on Friday that it upgraded Cominco Ltd's unsecured debt to BBB from BBB (low) with a stable trend.
The Toronto-based ratings agency said it also upgraded Cominco's preferred shares to Pfd-3 from Pfd-4 with a stable rating.
The higher quality ratings followed improved operating results from Cominco's Red Dog mine and the near completion of the Trail metallurgical modernization.

Dominion said the longer term expansion of the Red Dog lead and zinc mine, the expansion of Cominco's Cajamarquilla smelter and new mining opportunities in Peru would contribute to higher earnings for the mining concern.
